channel.title: innovation on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in innovation on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Tech Canvas
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This is where we share our journey in the ever-evolving landscape of technology. It’s a space where we unveil our latest breakthroughs, discuss our research, and delve into our innovative projects.

item.title: The Adjacent Possible
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: During our study about innovation, we find the topic of adjacent possible. Innovation happens but not many people can point out clearly.
